itemStateChanged

public void itemStateChanged(java.awt.event.ItemEvent e)
This method is called when a check box changes in the menu bar (or elsewhere). The if-statement is used to determine which checkbox was clicked and therefore which action to take.

Specified by:
itemStateChanged in interface java.awt.event.ItemListener
